channel.title: Path of Exile Public Beta Weekend May 11-13
channel.description:
[url]https://www.pathofexile.com/publicweekend/[/url]
All info here, hopefully this game plays well because I really like everything I've seen so far, reminds me of Diablo 1 and 2 mixed together with modern tech
here's some videos of it btw:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DuPwHYlrHCA']Path of Exile - Exclusive Shadow Class Footage & Update[/url]
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k8779Ff_qoc']WTF Is... - Path of Exile ?[/url]

item.description:

item.description:
DiePoente:

Though, the graphics are very nice and it looks very professional, for a F2P game.

I didn’t know it was F2P. So yeah, I agree.

item.source: Path of Exile Public Beta Weekend May 11-13

item.title: Path of Exile Public Beta Weekend May 11-13
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
Keresh:

I don’t find this game entertaining. At least diablo 3 has nice looking fights. This looks like diablo 2 with slightly better graphics and worse (is there any?) story. Not even trolling. Feel free to prove me wrong though.

Agree. The fights were disappointing, after playing Diablo 3 (Beta). D3 has an amazing combat system with great feedback. This, is just, too normal.

Though, the graphics are very nice and it looks very professional, for a F2P game.

Read full topic

item.title: Path of Exile Public Beta Weekend May 11-13
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
I’m enjoying it quite a fair bit. The character animations aren’t as smooth as Diablo 3 but the overall experience is quite fun and difficult

The 2D artwork reminds me heavily of diablo

item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
